Description:
Modern 4 B/R Home, 10 Acres With A Relaxing View
With instant street appeal, this well built and recently updated home sits on the Ballarat side of Clunes, only 5 minutes to the Clunes township and 15 minutes to the Western Highway via Miners Rest. The home offers full return veranda and large windows allow plenty of natural light. There is a formal lounge and separate dining room plus four bedrooms, a nursery and study. Three of the bedrooms have BIR's. The family bathroom is brand new plus a second shower and vanity have been installed in the laundry. The brand new kitchen offers a dishwasher, stainless steel sink, electric cooktop and oven plus island bench and an informal dining area. Outside features a sealed roundabout driveway leading to a double carport and brick garage 8m x 7m with concrete floor and power. There are established gardens, horse round yard, dam and entertaining area. The 10 acres is cleared and sits on a corner block with 2 road frontages, excellent views of Mount Beckworth and room for your livestock. There are two concrete tanks holding approximately 44,000 litres of water, one supplies the home and is topped up by the town water supply.
Insights: 11 other 4 bedroom house in CLUNES have recently been sold.

Address: 185 Mt Beckworth Court Road CLUNES VIC 3370
Description:
Totally Self Sufficient- Alternative Lifestyle- No Bills
This delightful home is set on 20 acres with fantastic views of Mt. Beckworth. The home consists of 2 good size bedrooms with BIR's, spacious open plan living with kitchen having lovely wooden benchtops and gas cooking, dining and lounge and a beautiful bright sunny bathroom and laundry.
The property is solar powered and also has tank water with the capacity of 45,500 litres. There are 3 paddocks, 3 dams which are all spring fed and a creek that usually flows all year, big generator and pumps. The property has well established gardens and fruit trees and is set up to run goats, so needless to say the fencing is perfect.
This home is in a beautiful quiet location with complete privacy, with its own self sufficiency and only minimal bills. Why wait any longer to inspect this property!!!
Insights: 7 other 2 bedroom house in CLUNES have recently been sold.

Description:
10 acres, Mount Beckworth Views & Planning permit
Zoned rural living, this allotment of 4 hectares or 10 acres has a great view to the west which includes Mount Beckworth. The land has an approved planning permit for the development of a single dwelling, build your dream home STCA and enjoy a northerly aspect and the overall location will see you a 5 minute drive back into Clunes or 15 minute to the Western highway via Miners Rest. The land is cleared, has had a tree shelter in place and a very small dam in the back corner. Services include sealed road, power and mains water passing at the front. The block is for genuine sale and the owners invite offers. Inspect today as you will not be disappointed, paperwork available from selling agent. Vendors are genuine sellers and invite offers.

Description:
"BISHOPS' Circa 1890's Cottage
Surrounded by a delightful garden setting is this picturesque cottage, located on a hill in a quiet street with a north facing front porch which gives quite a private and sunny spot for a cup of tea in winter. This cottage is only a few minutes stroll to historic Clunes CBD, made famous for its movie backdrops and popular book town weekend.
Further enhancing the appeal of the property is the beautiful big backyard which has complete privacy and has ample fruit trees which include apple, pears, plum, apricot, white mulberry, black mulberry, pomegranate, loquat, quince and a huge old peppercorn tree for the kids to climb and explore.
The cottage itself features two generous sized front bedrooms, one with an open fire place, an open plan lounge room and formal dining area with French doors that lead out to the magical gardens. New "Nectre" low emission wood heater and well appointed kitchen complete with gas cooking. Bathroom has shower and toilet and the laundry is tucked away "European style."
The property is well fenced and offers a double carport and two garden sheds. This gorgeous property is just waiting your inspection.
Insights: 7 other 2 bedroom house in CLUNES have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Home On Approx 2 and 1/2 Acres
This lovely, comfortable family home is on approximately 2 and 1/2 acres and only minutes to the centre of Clunes. The home has open plan living with kitchen, dining and family room, 3 bedrooms all with BIR's and bathroom has separate shower and bath. Outside there is an outdoor undercover entertaining area, a double garage, 3 horse stable with yards and a colour bond fence surrounds the front of the home making this ideal for a family and their pets. There is also ample of space in the backyard to grow fruit trees and have a vegie garden.

Description:
POSITION PERFECT......
If position and exposure is important then this property is PERFECT. With the corner location in the main street of Clunes and down the cafe end of town this historic solid brick building is Circa 1860s. This premises has the ability of being two smaller or one large retail space with 105sqm in total. The property offers electric heating, full toilet facilities the ability to split into four separate areas and a 60sqm private courtyard at the rear and rear access. The prefect investment for the future and the ideal retail space for now.

Description:
Lovely Home, On Large Block
This lovely 3 bedroom home is in a quiet location, set on a large block - 1440m2 and makes an ideal weekender, first home or an investment property. There are 2 large bedrooms with WIR's and the 3rd is big but hasn't BIR's. This open plan living home has a ktichen, dining , lounge, a nice bathroom and a large laundry. There are 2 air conditioners, one in the lounge and the other in the main bedroom and a large wood heater that warms the home. Outside there is decking under the verandas to sit down, relax and enjoy the views, a double lockup garage also ample room to grow fruit trees and have a vegetable garden. This property is a must to inspect!

Description:
Opportunity in Clunes
Located in historic township of Clunes, a short walking distance to Wesley College and centre of town, is this classic "Victorian" period home offering enormous potential. Set on a large allotment with shedding and fencing, the home has three bedrooms, a large lounge room, kitchen and dining, as well as a seperate family living room. High ceilings and two open fireplaces add to the home's character and charm. Whether you are looking for a family home, an investment, B&B opportunity,or a classic weekender, this property is a must see.

QUALITY HOME, PERFECT FOR THE FAMILY

Description:
PICTURE PERFECT COTTAGE - 8 ACRES - CLUNES
Escape to the country to enjoy the peace & tranquillity with this country lifestyle property offering a renovated 3 bedroom home with open plan living, an idyllic 8 acre valley setting, excellent shedding, dog runs, bore, winter creek running through the property & all within the township of Clunes. There is also the potential to subdivide the property (STCA), making this property a rare find indeed. This property would also make the perfect country retreat being only 25 minutes to Ballarat & 1½ hours to Melbourne. Take this opportunity to buy your own piece of 'gold' in historic Clunes. Inspect today.
Price: $285,000 - $300,000
Helen Newall 0419 510 488

Description:
Rare Finding, Private Setting, 50 Acres 30 Mins West Of Ballarat
This established mixed use farming property is located only 5 minutes North of Clunes on Tullaroop Creek. Consisting of 50 acres of rich volcanic soil with substantial infrastructure. This property would suit most rural pursuits. The home comprises 4 bedrooms, large open plan family, lounge and dining with cathedral ceilings. Fantastic kitchen with huge larder and solar hot water service. The outside working improvements include an almost new set of steel cattle yards with vets crush and race, two stand shearing shed, machinery shed, hay shed and a large silo. The property is watered via bore and troughs plus a stock domestic pump right from Birch's Creek. Divided into 4 main paddocks with electric offsets and strategic shelter belts, philaris and clover pastures. Located at the end of a quiet country road, this property would ideally suit dog breeders as no other homes within one kilometere. This would allow the council to look favourably upon any permit application. The property would also suit other small hobby farm pursuits, including alpacas, goats or a few head of cattle. Full frontage to permanent Birch's Creek.
Insights: 11 other 4 bedroom house in CLUNES have recently been sold.
